New Records: Yuzvendra Chahal equaled Bhuvneshwar Kumar's record with 90 T20I wickets.
Suryakumar Yadav hit his third T20I century in 45 balls.
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka was 8 down at 135 after 16 overs.
Chahal dismissed Dhananjaya de Silva for his 90th wicket.
Shivam Mavi took a brilliant catch to dismiss Charith Asalanka.
Hardik Pandya dismissed Avishka Fernando and Sri Lanka were three down after the powerplay.
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and opted to bat first.
Hardik Pandya emphasized the pitch conditions and their approach.
Dasun Shanaka discussed their strategy and replacements.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Live streaming was available on Disney+ Hotstar and Star Sports Network.
Others: India set a target of 229 runs for Sri Lanka.
Suryakumar Yadav and Shubman Gill stabilized the innings after early setbacks.
